Among the many accolades he received over the years, von Trier has won five European Film Awards, a César Award, a Palme d'Or, and has been nominated for an Academy Award and a Golden Globe. In his home country of Denmark, he has won seven Bodil Awards and fifteen Robert Awards. ==Organizations== ===AACTA Awards=== {| class=wikitable width=90% ! width=3%| Year ! width=27%| Nominated work
